mapper.insert:
insert jibsa set MEMBER_NO = null, JIBSA_RRN = #{ jibsaPrn }, AVAILABLE_AREA = #{ availableArea }, JIBSA_GENDER =#{ jibsaGender } , IS_SMOKING = #{ isSmoking }, WORK_COUNT = null, WORK_CAREER = null, VEHICLE = null, AVAILABLE_HOUR = null , AVAILABLE_TIMES = null, MOTIVE = null, EXPECTED_SALARY = null , IS_PRIVACY = null, IS_TRUE = null, CHAR_ADDRESS = null , IS_PRIMIUM = null, PRIMIUM_PAYMENT_DATE = null , IS_TRAINER = null
where ID=#{id}
